title: Setup Python package structure with src layout
description: Create src/consoul/ directory structure following modern Python packaging best practices. Include __init__.py, __main__.py for CLI entry point, and core module structure for TUI, AI provider integration, and configuration management.

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
Created Python package structure with src/ layout:
- src/consoul/__init__.py: Package metadata and version info
- src/consoul/__main__.py: CLI entry point placeholder
- src/consoul/ai/: AI provider integration module (LangChain)
- src/consoul/tui/: Textual-based TUI module
- src/consoul/config/: Configuration management
- src/consoul/utils/: Common utilities

All modules include proper docstrings and __init__.py files.
